content:
My new shirt 
 Ivan Higenyi 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sambaâ€™s dad bought him a 
 
 new schol shirt last 
 
 market day. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Samba never mises 
 
 schol. He walks to schol 
 
 with his litle sister. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Samba likes playing 
 
 fotbal after schol. He 
 
 wears his new shirt. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The shirt gets dirty. But 
 
 Samba does not want to 
 
 wash it! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On the field, Samba wants 
 
 everyone to se his new 
 
 shirt. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 In the morning Samba 
 
 goes to schol with the 
 
 dirty shirt. He ses the 
 
 teacher waiting at the gate. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Samba dodges schol that 
 
 day and goes acros the 
 
 road to play fotbal. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Unfortunately the new shirt 
 
 gets torn. Now Samba is in 
 
 trouble for dodging schol 
 
 and for tearing his new 
 
 schol shirt. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8
